title.rendered: Mission Control CEO at The National Museum of Computing

content.rendered: Part of the The National Museum of Computing’s Lecture Series, Mission Control’s CEO, Eddie Vassallo takes us through a rapid history of the Linux Operating System, why it still matters in 2024, and how to quickly jump in and give it a try.
